page.title: 06 Emergency Centre
page.content: The civil defence bunker is situated underground. It has walls abo inches thick and the ceiling is about 13 inches thick made of reinforced concrete to survive natural disasters and bombs in a war. It has 14 rooms rooms including telecommunications room,rest room,kitchen, map room,briefing room,hall,a food store(not permanently stocked) and various offices. Its equipment is not too modern consisting of a few radiation measures, a couple of of date teleprinters, an overhead projector and a small telephone exchange. The function of the bunker is to coordinate the services in the South Bucks area in the event of a peacetime emergency, for example floods, fires, or diseases or a wartime emergency, for example a nuclear attack.
